text:
I am having what appears to be a thread issue. I get the following exception w/ 
most runs of my program when I run with multiple threads.

org.apache.xalan.xpath.XPathProcessorException: pattern = 'MESSAGES/CVTC'
Extra illegal tokens: 'MESSAGES', '/' 

Through the use of a static method, my program accesses the following classes:

    XPathSupportDefault
    XPathProcessorImpl.initXPath
    XPath.execute

Are any of these methods not thread safe?
creator: tmuldoon@lightbridge.com
